amendment.description: An amendment numbered 451 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to require the Secretary of State to review actions by Brazilian armed forces related to that country's October 2022 presidential elections and to consider such actions under statutory guardrails on US assistance.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Schiff amendment was withdrawn.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A038) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Schiff.
